publish_all_docs: Publish all vault notes to YiDong
wait_for_publishing: Please wait for last publish to complete.
start_all_publish: Start to publish all vault notes...
confirm_publish_path_docs: Confirm to publish all notes to YiDong?
confirm_publish_all_docs: Confirm to publish all vault notes to YiDong??
setting_yidong_ob_publish_url_desc: service endpoint from YiDong platform admin page.
setting_yidong_api_key_desc: access key from YiDong platform admin page
setting_yidong_api_secret_desc: access key secret from YiDong platform admin page
setting_rename_auto_sync_desc: enable to auto sync note rename operation to yidong platform. note: you need to restart obsidian when enable.
setting_rename_auto_sync_freq_desc: config the auto-sync frequency in seconds. minimum: 1 second. default: sync every 3 seconds. set it to 1 second when you rename note frequently.
setting_remove_auto_sync_desc: enable to auto sync note removal operation to yidong platform. note: you need to restart obsidian when enable.
setting_remove_auto_sync_freq_desc: config the auto-sync frequency in seconds. minimum: 1 second. default: sync every 3 seconds. set it to 1 second when you remove note frequently.
warn_sync_freq_need_int: Sync frequency need to be an integer
err_chkPublished_failed: Failed to check note publish status
err_chkPublished_with_msg: Note publish status check with error: {{msg}}
err_attachConf_failed: Failed to get note attachment config
err_attachConf_with_msg: Get note attachment config with error: {{msg}}
err_no_attach_conf: Server: platform has no attach config.
err_doc_attach_ref_invalid: Attachment reference {{msg}} to an invalid resource path, unable to continue publish
err_attach_no_ext: Attachment reference  {{msg}} has no extension which is required
manual_title: you can find manual and docs below.
